text: Oni sprashivayut tebya o srazhenii v zapretnyy mesyats. Skazhi: «Srazhat'sya v etot mesyats - velikoye prestupleniye. Odnako sbivat' drugikh s puti Allakha, ne verovat' v Nego, ne puskat' v Zapovednuyu mechet' i vygonyat' ottuda yeye zhiteley - yeshche bol'sheye prestupleniye pered Allakhom. Iskusheniye khuzhe, chem ubiystvo. Oni ne perestanut srazhat'sya s vami, poka ne otvratyat vas ot vashey religii, yesli tol'ko smogut. A yesli kto iz vas otstupit ot svoyey religii i umret neveruyushchim, to yego deyaniya okazhutsya tshchetnymi kak v etom mire, tak i v Posledney zhizni. Oni yavlyayutsya obitatelyami Ognya i ostanutsya tam vechno»
